German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

drucken (“print”) +‎ -er

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈdʀʊkɐ/
  • Rhymes: -ʊkɐ
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Drucker m (genitive Druckers, plural Drucker, female Druckerin)

  1. agent noun of drucken; printer (person, especially male, who prints)
  2. printer (device)

Declension[edit]

Declension of Drucker
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinderDruckerdieDrucker
genitiveeinesdesDruckersderDrucker
dativeeinemdemDruckerdenDruckern
accusativeeinendenDruckerdieDrucker

Related terms[edit]
